channel.title: When ever I try to buy a cape, it kicks me out
channel.description:
Hello, well on my server... I added skill capes and stuff. I added them to a shop and when you click value, it will say the name of the cape, not NON EXISTING ITEM!!!. It auto kicks me out and here is what it says. Code:
[code]WorldObjects.cfg: file not found. Pkownscape is on the run On 43594 ! ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1421 Anfrany1 is signing onto server. Anfrany1 character file successfully loaded. Anfrany1 successfully signed onto server. [client-1-Anfrany1]: RemoveItem 5: 14095 InterID: 3900 slot: 13 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 14095 at client.addItem(client.java:14109) at client.buyItem(client.java:30487) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:21711) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16387) at client.process(client.java:16359) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:53) Pkownscape[fatal] - exception Game saved for player Anfrany1 ClientHandler: Client Anfrany1 disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1422 Anfrany1 is signing onto server. Anfrany1 character file successfully loaded. Anfrany1 successfully signed onto server.[/code]
Thanks!

item.title: When ever I try to buy a cape, it kicks me out
item.dc:creator: @Pkownscape Pkownscape
item.description:
@Pkownscape wrote:

[quote=“Lusfr, post:2, topic:177092”]ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 14095
at client.addItem(client.java:14109)[/quote]
So… What should i do?

Read full topic
